examples: I'm feeling bored and don't know what to do.
She looked bored during the meeting.
He gets easily bored with repetitive tasks.
Estou me sentindo entediado e não sei o que fazer.
Ela parecia entediada durante a reunião.
Ele fica facilmente entediado com tarefas repetitivas.

suggested: Why don't scientists trust atoms when they're 'bored'? Because they make up everything!
Feeling 'bored' can be a lonely and disheartening experience, especially when you're longing for excitement.
I get so angry when I have a lot of free time but still feel 'bored' and unproductive.
Did you know that feeling 'bored' can actually stimulate creativity and encourage new ideas?
There's no distinct smell associated with being 'bored', but it might make you more aware of other scents around you.
When feeling 'bored', engaging in activities that involve tactile sensations can help alleviate the restlessness.
Sharing moments of 'boredom' with friends or loved ones can create stronger bonds and deeper connections.
